name: y
description: Built an online multiplayer Ping-Pong game using Javascript.  Written server side using Node.Js and frontend in HTML, CSS & Javascript. Utilised Socket.io library for using websockets for establishing a persistent connection between client and server. ![Game](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67193749/229496346-9281c7d2-2f90-4b3e-a6e1-6ebdcde846b5.png)
